greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) giving number of (<=2)-covers of an n-set with k blocks.
comment: Cover of a set is (<=2)-cover if every element of the set is covered with at most two blocks of the cover.
mathematica: cc = CoefficientList[# + O[x]^m, x]& /@ CoefficientList[egf + O[y]^m, y];
(Range[0, Length[cc]-1]! * cc)[[1 ;; rows]] /. {0, a__} :> {a} // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 13 2019 *)
results.author: Goran Kilibarda, _Vladeta Jovovic_, May 12 2004
